SEARCH
Module clientGUI
Package com.etiennecollin.tp2.clientGUI

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.tp2.clientGUI.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ClientController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The ClientController class is responsible for handling user input and communicating with the server. It implements the Initializable interface, which allows it to initialize components from a JavaFX FXML file.

    • disconnect

      private void disconnect() throws IOException
      Disconnects the client from the server by sending a DISCONNECT_COMMAND to the server through the objectOutputStream.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when writing to the objectOutputStream.

    • displayErrorAlert

      private void displayErrorAlert(String message)
      Displays an error message alert to the user and also broadcasts the error message to the CLI error output.
      Parameters:

    • getCourses

      private ArrayList<Course> getCourses(String semester) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Sends a command to the server to load available courses for a specific semester.
      Parameters:
      semester - The semester to filter courses with.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the available courses.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when dealing with the client input/output streams.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the returned Course object by the server is invalid.

    • onRegisterButtonClick

      private void onRegisterButtonClick()
      Sends a registration request to the server and notifies the user of the success of the registration.

    • register

      private String register() throws IOException, IllegalArgumentException, ClassNotFoundException
      Sends a registration form to the server.
      Returns:
      The answer from the server.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when dealing with the client input/output streams.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the returned String by the server is invalid.
      IllegalArgumentException - Iif the createStudent() method throws the exception.

    • displayInformationAlert

      private void displayInformationAlert(String message)
      Displays an information alert to the user and and also broadcasts the information to the CLI output.
      Parameters:
      message - The error message.

    • createStudent

      private Student createStudent() throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a student object containing the information about a student.
      Returns:
      A student object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the student information is invalid.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the client controller.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
